## Loading iris dataset

```{r}
data("iris")

paged_table(iris)
```

## Transforming data into the longer format

```{r}
iris_long<- iris %>%
  tidyr::pivot_longer(cols= -Species, names_to = "Trait", values_to = "Size")

print(iris_long)
```
